review: I'm grateful for Dr.Rhjaphin.  It was a great expirence with her, she was very friendly and an amazing human. My hearty thanks and great wishes!

context: Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Child Birth Education,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Gynae Problems,Maternal Care/ Checkup,
review:
No words can describe how  grateful I felt during my pregnancy and labour and my sincere Thanks to Dr.Rijaphin for made me feel like such,  I am sure I feel blessed during and after delivery is only because of you, and I could not ask for more!

It’s my first pregnancy and on scan we have observed Polyhydramnios is where there is too much amniotic fluid around the baby, due to which the baby head is not engaged in to pelvis even after 39 weeks, There comes my guardian angel Dr. Rijaphin, OMG! what a beautiful soul inside and out, Though I am from a medical background, I have never met such a gyno with this level of patience and real care from the bottom of the heart since day one we met! I am already in love with her.

I was very anxious about my labour as like everyone, but, I wanted to have a normal delivery at any point due to some personal concerns, she understood and supported me personally and professionally beyond any other doctor would go for their patient’s.

Even during the active labour where everyone lost our hope for normal delivery and even my own family started convincing me for C section, where the only person Dr.Rijaphin tried all the way possible and went above and beyond (where she doesn’t have to and simply could have insist me to go for C section as the baby head is not engaged and I was dilated only 4 cm). 

Not just during our ante natal visit and labour, she is one sweet heart where she used to follow up even after that and guide me on every single detail. 

For anyone who doesn’t have any idea about pregnancy and labour, I swear, Ladies, you can blindly go to her and she would definitely make u feel the same way!

I am super grateful and blessed for get to know her through this phase and I wish all the love and happiness to this amazing women all her life

Dr. Rijaphin mam is very friendly and I went to OMR branch when I'm in 8th month and doctor explained everything in detail and doctor is so friendly and explained all my doubts and I had a normal delivery and doctor is sooo encouraging, pleasant and very positive. Madam encouraged me throughout the labor journey. I'm very thankful to Dr.Rijaphin Mam.
The doctor was friendly, very patient and assertive during discussion. She answered all our queries with  practical guidance.

I was in 5 th Month moved to Chennai just went to OMR Cloud 9 for Consulation with Rijaphin Madam
She was pleasant and creted positive environment through out delivery 
Wishing with smile and taking care of me explained about procedure in simple way... 

Thank you Rijaphin Madam and Anjana (Nandu) for guide ing . 

Best wishs

Thank you ...  Dr.Rijaphin mam your experience and excellence played a big role in boosting up my confidence during pregnancy and after the delivery..

Because of your professionalism and great hands which gave us peace of mind while delivering the baby... without you it's not possible to make a normal delivery....

Feeling comfortable with this doctor 
and satisfied treatment .any doubts can be asked Friendly. Now feeling better
